name: You Are Already Dead
entries: At 17th level, your strikes can leave a lasting affect on unsuspecting targets. Once per Long rest, as an Action, you can attack a creature that you have Death Marked. That attack is considered a Critical Hit. That creature must make a Constitution Saving Throw (DC = 8 + prof + INT). On a fail, they take the maximum damage from your Sneak Attack dice.
The range of your Death Mark now covers the entire plane of existence you are on.
